website_summaries.verdict: The reasonably priced Puma TSUGI Apex Jewel sneakers are equipped with modern comfort one could ask in a women’s sneaker. The shoes are geared for high-performance style for the ladies who want stylish Puma kicks with a little bit of metallic shine.The upper composed of breathable knit with sock-like construction has interiors that promise superb cushioning in the footbed. While some wearers criticized its lack of arch support, the comfort coming from the lightweight Ignite Foam cushioning technology delivers maximum energy and the stylish metallic accents are enough reason to take this modern silhouette seriously.
pros: Majority of female wearers find them easy to put on as the shoes have an elastic sock-like upper that adapts well to the contours of the feet
Numerous reviewers noted that the Puma TSUGI Apex Jewel shoes are “wide feet friendly.”
A significant number of wearers attest to the sneaker’s comfortable feel brought about by the Ignite Foam midsole
Some observed that the metallic accents make the shoes look premium and expensive
Some reported that they would get compliments for wearing the sneaker
Some buyers say they bought a pair because it is available in various monochromatic colorways
The shoe has a sporty, versatile, and stylish design perfect for everyday casual wear
A good number of people gave positive remarks on the budget-friendly pricing of the shoes
A few were happy to note that the knit material in the upper is breathable
cons: Quite a lot of complaints focused on the larger size of the Puma TSUGI Apex Jewel sneakers
Some advised wearers to go a half size down especially those with narrow feet
A few commenters criticized its lack of arch support which results in some discomfort for those with plantar fasciitis
One buyer posted a negative critique on the white colorway as it stains easily and could be difficult to clean

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. True to color.
customer_reviews.text: They were a too big I should have gotten size 10 instead of the 10 1/2. Because they rub the back of my ankle, which is irritating. But That’s not the sellers fault. But still love the look of the shoe. Will be wearing them with thicker ankle socks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: These rub the back of my heel and cause blisters. I had to return :( Liked the look but just not practical for walking or support.
customer_reviews.author: Chels

customer_reviews.title: Cute but uncomfortable at first
customer_reviews.text: Really love the look of this shoe, but the backs rub really bad unless you wear high socks. I will say, now that I’ve worn them in a little bit, it’s gotten better.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff_ku

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they would feel similar to my puma pacer cage next shoes (which are super comfortable and fitted). However this pair was uncomfortable and the back of the shoe continuously rubs my ankles raw and the shoelaces come undone every 10 minutes. While these shoes look awesome, for someone who wants a practical comfortable pair of workout shoes, these are definitely not it.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then expected, strange quality
customer_reviews.text: First I’ll say these are very cute: hard plastic type of shoe vs the regular styles. For me these are not true to size, if I were to order again I’d go half a size smaller. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: White
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look for the white shoes!!! They got dirty so fast and did not come out on the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes - they look fabulous, are wonderful quality and are quite comfortable. I had to size a half size down when ordering, but other than that had no issues. I wear these for day to day - I would not recommend for working out or cardio as they are a bit stiffer/heavier shoe.
customer_reviews.author: KELLY

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new sneakers. Very comfortable and fashionable. I walked for hours in those around the city. No blisters at all. I wouldn't work out in them, but they are great for casual wear with your favorite jeans or skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: Great option to ballet flats
customer_reviews.text: Yes I said it. Everyone raves about them. The gold accents make it a bit dressier than the average sneakers and the shape. I pair it with a black and white barrel purse and it’s eveything for me. From Costco , driving and have worn them to 2 board meetings.
customer_reviews.author: McLaneyTrio

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought they were
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these shoes because I have a pair with the same name in a different color. These ain’t it! They are similar to the ones I already have in name and style but not comfort. By the end of the day my first and only time wearing them, I was Walton the back of them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very very narrow
customer_reviews.text: Had to take it to the shoemaker for him to stretch because I love the design. Wish they made them wider.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Barahona

customer_reviews.title: Cute Army and Mint green sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were cute in color. Due to the picture I thought these ran a little wide. I was right and they fit just right due to me havi g wide feet. I also order a 1/2 size down I usually buy 9.5 but I ordered a 9. They are comfortable. I took a pic w/o flash and the darker 1 is w/flash
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Fancy and nice
customer_reviews.text: I received a lot of compliments especially for the color I picked. Also I spent 5 days in NYC and I walked around the entire city without any feet soreness, nothing. So 5 stars for me. They really fit a little wide so I don't recommend to skinny feet
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Taraballi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: I do not work out in these. Strictly a fashion shoe for me so I love them. They are comfortable and fit as expected. I use magic eraser to clean them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah K

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These look much better in person and on foot. Got these for a steal and am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers are very pleased. They look stylish. Ideal fit on the foot 25 cm. I bought a size of 8.5
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got them as a nice hang out sneaker. They look great and got them for a great deal! Very happy. I put some arch support insoles in them and they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Not really impressed
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem pretty cheap. They run big and did not fit at all. I did end up returning, as of now I wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Parker

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I wear these all the time. And I've walked some distance in them. Super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marrissa

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and allows me to use my own arch support inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Monica G Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: No support...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super cute but provides no support for my feet. I have plantar and it feels like I am walking without shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes in the green. It's a great shade, looks nice with jeans. Very comfortable and roomy!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy R.

customer_reviews.title: White Alert!
customer_reviews.text: They look real good on my foot. But in white the fabric on the top stains so easy and is very hard to clean. White is quite disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great show
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy nice looking. Sturdy show. I would say it’s a bit wide
customer_reviews.author: Cuttingchef

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the purchase. Comfy fit and good price.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyG

customer_reviews.title: The heel is a bit worn
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good just The heel was a bit worn!It was no good for a long time walking
customer_reviews.author: VICEN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shoes! I get so many compliments everywhere I go. They’re extremely comfortable too
customer_reviews.author: AlyBowman

customer_reviews.title: Half size too big
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and cute. They do run about a half size too big.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes, but they will hurt your ankle
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are cute and a little wider than expected which made them loose. The strap on the back scraped my ankle really bad to the point where my ankle bled. Overall, I like the shoes, but I’m not sure if I can endure the pain on my ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Tokecia Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Definitely order 1/2 a size smaller. Other than that absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Sara Jo

customer_reviews.title: Soles are non skid
customer_reviews.text: Just watch your step the soles are non skid and it’s so easy to slip and fall .They should have made better soles!
customer_reviews.author: Nyaradzo Museva

customer_reviews.title: Light shoes but not for excercising
customer_reviews.text: Very light shoes good for walking but wouldnt recommend to work out
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Shoes
customer_reviews.text: They shipped way faster than expected, fit better than expected, and are very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: MzBerry79

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Hard to squeeze fit in bc the top doesn’t stretch but love them so much I don’t mind the extra few seconds
customer_reviews.author: Arianna marquis

customer_reviews.title: Bling bling
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, great design and great fit, true to size. The gold accents just set them off.
customer_reviews.author: Larke

customer_reviews.title: Love the look not the fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes they just run large and wide. Love the style however. They go on pretty easily, however, I wish you could tue tge laces tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Had to give away. Meant for fat feet. I would go half size down
customer_reviews.author: Bianchor Smith

customer_reviews.title: Terrible fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 7.5 these are WAY too wide! I won’t be able to wear these ever. Super disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down maybe
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but they run big. I wear a 7.5 these are too big
customer_reviews.author: Bre Bre

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Kind of disappointed in the materials they chose to use. Love the color. However arch support is barely there.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R.

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide ankles; dont get this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: To tight in the front. It creased and pressed into the front of my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: They were shipped in a timely manner, fast and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the entire shoe, the color was very beautiful, the size was on point!
customer_reviews.author: MikaR

customer_reviews.title: THEY WILL NOT DISAPPOINT YOU!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THE SHOES..THEY ARE VERY COMFY AND CUTE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha M English

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable to wear. The appearance is very beautiful and very light. I like it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my best friend and she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Suga

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pumas!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They are my favorite pair!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Tsugi Apex Jewel Sneaker
product_meta.description: Tsugi represents the PUMA running sport style era, taking cues from the past and revisiting them in a more futuristic way. The tsugi apex jewel wn's is found in three colour ways and it goes to the next level with an added elastic strap to create more comfort between the shoe and you. The rubber outsole, the classic center lacing, the metallic details and the mid cut create a futuristic street style running look and feel.
